subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic won his 26th straight match to remain unbeaten in 2011, defeating Slovenia’s Blaz Kavcic, 6-3, 6-2, in the Serbia Open quarterfinals in Belgrade.
snippet: Novak Djokovic won his 26th straight match to remain unbeaten in 2011, defeating Slovenia’s Blaz Kavcic, 6-3, 6-2, in the Serbia Open quarterfinals in Belgrade.
